title: No inappropriate threads, replies, or profile statuses.
description: Keep everything safe for work and use common sense.

title: Don't talk about anything religious or political.
description: This isn't Twitter. This is a wannabe stack overflow made by a teenager. Talk about coding or casual things.

title: No spamming.
description: Don't create a bunch of accounts (cough cough.. daniel), threads, or replies. (This includes dupelicate threads asking the same question)

title: Don't try to hack my site with malice.
description: Don't break something and not tell me. If you manage to break something, put it in the bug-reports category so I can fix it. You'll be rewarded for this.

title: Don't advertise your projects on the website.
description: There's a showcase on Mr. Codes. Use it.

title: Don't harass other users.
description: This is a safe space for students to collaborate and learn. Don't ruin the experience I created.

title: Don't bombard me with questions.
description: If you want the site updated, don't ask me to update the site. Just fill up bug-reports and suggestions and I'll take a hint.

title: Don't share challenge answers.
description: Sharing challenge answers or helping someone with a challenge is strictly prohibited.

title: Don't claim to be a staff member of DevChat unless you are
description: Real staff members possess the 'administrator' badge on their profile. Anyone else is a fake and a fraud.

title: Don't use an alternate account while you're banned.
description: I will figure out your alternate account. When I do, you'll never be allowed back on the platform.
